SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.service.impl

Class DatabaseAuthorizationCodeService

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.service.impl.DatabaseAuthorizationCodeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthorizationCodeService
public class DatabaseAuthorizationCodeService extends Object implements AuthorizationCodeService
Database implementation of the AuthorizationCodeService interface. Provides methods for authorization code management with persistence.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Airport Gate Management System

  • Method Details

    • isValidAuthCode

      public boolean isValidAuthCode(String authCode, UserRole requestedRole)
      Description copied from interface: AuthorizationCodeService
      Validates whether a given authorization code grants access to a specific role. This method ensures that users can only register for roles they are authorized to hold.
      Specified by:
      isValidAuthCode in interface AuthorizationCodeService
      Parameters:
      authCode - The authorization code provided during registration
      requestedRole - The role the user is attempting to register for
      Returns:
      true if the code is valid for the requested role, false otherwise

    • markCodeAsUsed

      public void markCodeAsUsed(String authCode, UserModel user)
      Description copied from interface: AuthorizationCodeService
      Marks an authorization code as used by a specific user. This method updates the code record to indicate which user used it and when.
      Specified by:
      markCodeAsUsed in interface AuthorizationCodeService
      Parameters:
      authCode - The authorization code to mark as used
      user - The user who used the code

    • generateNewCode

      public String generateNewCode(UserRole role, String description, LocalDateTime expiresAt)
      Description copied from interface: AuthorizationCodeService
      Generates a new authorization code for a specific role. Creates a secure random code and stores it in the database.
      Specified by:
      generateNewCode in interface AuthorizationCodeService
      Parameters:
      role - The role the code will authorize
      description - A description of the code's purpose
      expiresAt - When the code will expire (null for no expiration)
      Returns:
      The generated code string

    • getAllAuthCodes

      public List<AuthorizationCodeModel> getAllAuthCodes()
      Description copied from interface: AuthorizationCodeService
      Retrieves all authorization codes in the system.
      Specified by:
      getAllAuthCodes in interface AuthorizationCodeService
      Returns:
      A list of all authorization codes

    • deactivateAuthCode

      public boolean deactivateAuthCode(Long id)
      Description copied from interface: AuthorizationCodeService
      Deactivates an authorization code by ID. Deactivated codes can no longer be used for registration.
      Specified by:
      deactivateAuthCode in interface AuthorizationCodeService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the code to deactivate
      Returns:
      true if deactivation was successful, false if code wasn't found

    • deleteAuthCode

      public void deleteAuthCode(Long id)
      Description copied from interface: AuthorizationCodeService
      Deletes an authorization code from the system.
      Specified by:
      deleteAuthCode in interface AuthorizationCodeService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the code to delete

    • generateSecureRandomCode

      private String generateSecureRandomCode()
      Generates a secure random code of specified length.
      Returns:
      Randomly generated secure code
